vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Specific Use Permit for the sale of alcoholic beverages in conjunction with a general merchandise or food store 3,500 square feet or less on property zoned an RR-D-1 Regional Retail District with a D-1 Liquor Control Overlay, on the south line of Great Trinity Forest Way (Loop 12), east of Oklaunion Drive
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval for a two-year period, subject to a site plan and conditions
Z190-122(AU)
